oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Discussion - Sam Phillips in the Studio - 2015-08-29
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Panel discussion: Go,Cat Go: Sam Phillips in the Studio from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on August 29, 2015. In support of the exhibition Flyin' Saucers Rock & Roll: The Cosmic Genius of Sam Phillips
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Peter Guralnick; Sonny Burgess; J. M. Van Eaton; W. S. Holland; Jerry Phillips
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Discussion moderated by Peter Guralnick. Participants include Sonny Burgess, J. M. Van Eaton, W. S. "Fluke" Holland and Jerry Phillips.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Phillips, Sam, 1923-2003; Guralnick, Peter; Van Eaton, J. M.; Burgess, Sonny; Holland, W. S.; Phillips, Jerry;
